quote_last: on a July evening, a crowd of summer visitors--mostly fathers of families--burdened with parcels, portfolios, and ladies' hat-boxes, was trailing along from the little station of Helkovo, in the direction of the summer villas.
title: The Party and Other Stories
author: Anton Pavlovich Chekhov

quote_first: I had been delayed at a case and it was
quote_time_case: a little after half past six
quote_last: when I found myself at Baker Street once more
title: The Adventure of The Blue Carbuncle
author: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle
